pullrequest.title: DRC Finals Demo: Add blocks for 3rd task and change shortkeys

content.raw:
I think this refers to the final result, maybe it should be clearer that we're talking about the final solution.

In fact, the 4th sentence already states that a larger disk cannot be on top of a smaller disk. So I think just saying that all disks must be moved to a different peg is enough, right?
content.html:
I think this refers to the final result, maybe it should be clearer that we're talking about the final solution.

In fact, the 4th sentence already states that a larger disk cannot be on top of a smaller disk. So I think just saying that all disks must be moved to a different peg is enough, right?
